component.name: getPhotoComments
component.description: This method returns comments on meetup photos. To post messages, see the corresponding write method

component.name: postPhotoComment
component.description: This method posts comments that appear below photos

component.name: getPhotoAlbums
component.description: This method returns photo albums associated with Meetup groups. To create albums, see the corresponding write method.

component.name: getPhotos
component.description: This method returns photos by member, group, album, event, photo ID, or tagged member.
